metadata.title: Disclaimer - SoloBoard
metadata.description: Read SoloBoard's disclaimer regarding service availability, data accuracy, and limitation of liability.

sections.title: "As-Is" Service
sections.content: SoloBoard Command Center is provided on an "as-is" and "as-available" basis. We make no warranties, expressed or implied, regarding the accuracy or availability of the service.

sections.title: No Financial Advice
sections.content: The metrics, charts, and data displayed on SoloBoard are for informational purposes only. They do not constitute financial, investment, or legal advice. Always verify critical data directly via the source platform (e.g., your Stripe dashboard).

sections.title: Third-Party Failures
sections.content: SoloBoard relies on third-party APIs. We are not responsible for:
items: Inaccuracies caused by third-party data providers
Loss of data due to API changes by providers like Google or Apple

sections.title: Limitation of Liability
sections.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, SoloBoard shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages (including loss of profits) arising out of your use of the service.

transparency_note.content: Have questions about our disclaimer? We believe in transparency. Send a DM to our founder on X
